transcript.text: Will Pierre-Yves still be able to desist? It's now or never.
In Japan, many buildings are abandoned.
This night, we've decided to visit one of them.
Don't ever go in those kind of places without being accompanied by a professional.
Apparently the hotel shut in 2008.
It's crazy how in 9 years the place has completely collapsed.
This was some kind of karaoke room.
Sh*t there were singing rooms in the hotel, karaoke rooms man!
Here, there is a sign with music notes
and there, a sort of sound system
it really looks like a singing room...
Sure it was a karaoke there, definitely.
Earlier we were on the other side of this wall, in the kitchen. And now we are in the refectory where people were eating.
- Oh ! There still soya sauce of the time.
- Not in a good shape...
- Not in a good shape. Indeed.
Below the hotel there is a river. I think there was a lot of humidity in the hotel, and it explain why it decayed that much.
And that's sad because the hotel had an beautiful view.
Actually, in front of this abandoned hotel there is an not abandoned one that's uge.
And I think that one survived the economical crisis, and this one did not.
Just below,
that's a fu**ing river !
We are in the most dangerous place of the hotel man !

but they left them here, i don't know why...
